name: Boss Outro Effects
author: Alucard648
info: Spice up boss death animations. Made on request by SkyFlare.
description: Not much to say. If boss is dead, the script plays string, sprite, quake and flash.
setup: Place anyehere in the screen D0 - boss enemy slot (1 - 10) D1 - quake strangth and duration D2 - screen flash duration, in frames D3 - string to display on boss death D4 - sprite to display at the center of dead boss D5 - sprite width (in tiles, 0->1) D6 - sprite height (in tiles, 0->1)
